title: FS: T206 Camnitz Sovereign PSA 4 SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Camnitz Sovereign PSA 4 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling a very nice T206 Howie Camnitz (arms folded) Sovereign 150/25 PSA 4.
Only 3 graded higher. Asking $175 dlvd. Paypal F/F or Chase Bank Quickpay.  For questions or better pictures email: [url]rknight1@columbus.rr.com[/url] Thanks!
